name: Zoe Gillenwater
bio: Zoe is a Web designer and developer specialising in Responsive Web design, user experience, and Web accessibility techniques to maximise usability, device compatibility, and awesomeness. She is the author of the “New Riders books Stunning CSS3: A Project-based Guide to the Latest in CSS” and “Flexible Web Design: Creating Liquid and Elastic Layouts with CSS” and the video training “Web Accessibility Principles” for lynda.com. She currently works as a UX designer for Booking.com.
